${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AlterEgo.NAME: Alter Ego
${modID}:AlterEgo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Forget all other attack cards in your hand.

${modID}:AllADream.NAME: All a Dream
${modID}:AllADream.DESCRIPTION: Heal 20HP. At the end of combat, lose 15HP.

${modID}:AndAnotherThing.NAME: And Another Thing
${modID}:AndAnotherThing.DESCRIPTION: Awaken 1. If the car you choose costs 2 or more energy, awaken again.

${modID}:BackAndForth.NAME: Back And Forth
${modID}:BackAndForth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy twice. Forget.

${modID}:BlankSlate.NAME: Blank Slate
${modID}:BlankSlate.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle every forgotten card in play into your deck. Exhaust.

${modID}:BreakTheCycle.NAME: Break The Cycle
${modID}:BreakTheCycle.DESCRIPTION: Awaken 1. If the card you awaken is an attack, gain its base attack as block.

${modID}:Closure.NAME: Closure
${modID}:Closure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If remembered, gain !M! health. Exhaust.

${modID}:Compulsion.NAME: Compulsion
${modID}:Compulsion.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Deal !D! damage and gain !B! block. Add a copy of this card to your discard. Forget.

${modID}:Daydream.NAME: Daydream
${modID}:Daydream.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, retain !M! random forgotten card.

${modID}:Dizzy.NAME: Dizzy
${modID}:Dizzy.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Forget a random card in your hand. Forget.

${modID}:DreamSequence.NAME: Dream Sequence
${modID}:DreamSequence.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Forget 1 or more cards. Draw that many cards.

${modID}:DreamTraveler.NAME: Dream Traveler
${modID}:DreamTraveler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. transform this card for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Egoism.NAME: Egoism (Check power)
${modID}:Egoism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card of cost 2 or more, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Envelop.NAME: Envelop
${modID}:Envelop.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each forgotten card in your deck.

${modID}:ExposureTherapy.NAME: Exposure Therapy
${modID}:ExposureTherapy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Shuffle a Trauma into your deck.

${modID}:Foreshadowing.NAME: Foreshadowing
${modID}:Foreshadowing.DESCRIPTION: Awaken 1. If you choose an attack, apply !M! vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ForgottenCard.NAME: Forgotten Card
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Until you play this card, its action is hidden and its cost is changed to 1. It is remembered when played.

${modID}:HappyPlace.NAME: Happy Place
${modID}:HappyPlace.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. End your turn and have another turn. Exhaust.

${modID}:HardReset.NAME: Hard Reset
${modID}:HardReset.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Lose all your block. gain 2 energy and draw 3 cards.

${modID}:HideUnderTheCovers.NAME: Hide Under The Covers
${modID}:HideUnderTheCovers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

${modID}:IgnoranceIsStrength.NAME: Ignorance Is Strength
${modID}:IgnoranceIsStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and draw 1 card for every forgotten card in your hand.

${modID}:InnerChild.NAME: Inner Child
${modID}:InnerChild.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of the longest-forgotten card by !M!.

${modID}:InOneEar.NAME: In One Ear
${modID}:InOneEar.DESCRIPTION: The first time in your turn you forget a card, draw !M! card.

${modID}:LucidDream.NAME: Lucid Dream
${modID}:LucidDream.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, awaken !M! and gain !M! amnesia.

${modID}:MagicalThinking.NAME: Magical Thinking
${modID}:MagicalThinking.DESCRIPTION: Exchange the cost of this card with another card in your hand until the end of combat.

${modID}:MemorySkip.NAME: Memory Skip
${modID}:MemorySkip.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Gain !B! block. The next card you play costs 0.

${modID}:NewLeaf.NAME: New Leaf
${modID}:NewLeaf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If Fatal, awaken 1 card and permanently transform it.

${modID}:Oblivious.NAME: Oblivious
${modID}:Oblivious.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you forget a card, gain !M! block.

${modID}:PavlovianResponse.NAME: Pavlovian Response
${modID}:PavlovianResponse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you remember an attack, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:PsionicScream.NAME: Psionic Scream
${modID}:PsionicScream.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Deal !D! Damage to all enemies.

${modID}:PsychicStorm.NAME: Psychic Storm
${modID}:PsychicStorm.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 strength. When you remember an attack, its damage is dealt to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PsychicTsunami.NAME: Psychic Tsunami
${modID}:PsychicTsunami.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of cards remembered this combat.

${modID}:REMSleep.NAME: REM Sleep
${modID}:REMSleep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a forgotten card, gain !M! Vigour.

${modID}:Repress.NAME: Repress
${modID}:Repress.DESCRIPTION: Forget !M! card in your hand. Gain !B! Block. Forget.

${modID}:SelfProtection.NAME: Self Protection
${modID}:SelfProtection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If remembered, gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:SleepingPill.NAME: Sleeping Pill
${modID}:SleepingPill.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Gain !B! Block. Forget a card.

${modID}:Sleepwalk.NAME: Sleepwalk
${modID}:Sleepwalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw a card. Forget a card.

${modID}:SpinningStrike.NAME: Spinning strike
${modID}:SpinningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Shuffle a Dizzy into your deck.

${modID}:SpiritGuidance.NAME: Spirit Guidance
${modID}:SpiritGuidance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If remembered, gain !M! energy.

${modID}:Subliminal.NAME: Subliminal
${modID}:Subliminal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you remember a skill, apply !M! weak to all enemies.

${modID}:Torpor.NAME: Torpor
${modID}:Torpor.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! weak to all enemies. Gain !M! Amnesia.

${modID}:TossAndTurn.NAME: Toss And Turn
${modID}:TossAndTurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

${modID}:WakeFromDanger.NAME: Wake From Danger
${modID}:WakeFromDanger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. if remembered, gain an additional !M! block.
